info.name: Logik Configurator Runtime APIs
info.description:
Logik.io Runtime API Documentation

Contact Support:
 Email: support@logik.io

request.description:
# Reconfigure existing Configuration

Update an existing Logik configuration. Same endpoint as _Initialize a new Configuration_, but with the addition of:

```json
"configurationAttributes": {
                "LGK__ConfigurationId__c": "<uuid>"
            }
```

where `uuid` is an existing Logik Configuration Id.

request.description:
# Save Configuration

Same endpoint as _Update a Configuration_ with query param `save=true`. Can pass either an empty payload or an array of field objects to update specific variables in the configuration

response.name: Save Configuration - No Update
response.body:
{
    "fields": [
        {
            "userEdited": true,
            "dataType": "number",
            "visibilityState": "visible",
            "editable": "true",
            "variableName": "mfgQty",
            "value": 3
        },

request.description:
# Get a Configuration

Get an existing Logik configuration. If data needs to be changed, use the _Reconfigure existing Configuration_ API call instead
